summary: of all common wand cores, dragon heartstring is the only one where an animal had to die in order to use it for a wand, all...

tags: it's tulip karasu not tulip kasaru
that being said my character is from slytherin
summary:
Tulip Karasu (or at least, my visualization of her).
I'm convinced that she's one of the spunkiest characters in the Hogwarts...
body:
Tulip Karasu (or at least, my visualization of her).

I’m convinced that she’s one of the spunkiest characters in the Hogwarts Mystery universe. After all, if you cannot be an eccentric Ravenclaw then is life even worth living?

reblog.comment:

blog.name: redb4black
blog.title: Little Red
blog.description: Just someone who loves to write, read and laze around.

body:
Petunia

What if there’s was more to the fact why Petunia spoiled Dudley to that extent? What if deep down inside, she felt so bitter by the fact her parents preferred Lily over her simply because Lily was magic? So she made sure Harry felt the same way she did, neglected. And someway along it, she began to treat him harsher and the treatment got worse?

summary:
Albus: Promise me you are not going to be embarrasing!
Harry: I promise! I'm a professional teacher, Al, I'm not going to tell...
body:
Albus: Promise me you are not going to be embarrasing!
Harry: I promise! I'm a professional teacher, Al, I'm not going to tell your classmates about that time you ran naked towards the neighbours garden
Scorpius: Wow, seriously? Hahaha
Albus: DAD!

blog.name: sunlit-music
blog.title: sunlit-music
blog.description:
This is where I blog about King Killer Chronicles, Harry Potter, Mental Health services, and post nature photos. I post photos I’ve taken of the beach, oceans, rivers, flowers, lovely plants, Christmas lights, and my own fan art, which includes KKC characters I’ve drawn. I don’t make any money from creating fan art or writing fan fiction. The KKC Kingkiller Chronicles characters belong to Patrick Rothfuss. I also post crisis line phone numbers, reblog photos of beautiful places, lgbt religious posts and any other random stuff I like that comes to mind. ❤️☺️😎 For Aboriginal Australians: please note this tumblr contains mentions and images of deceased people.

I don’t own the photos and art reblogged. Credit goes to the original owners or creators. The background and user picture icon on my tumblr are from a wallpaper app. Please feel free to let me know how you’d like to be credited for your photos, posts or art. You can also see my art at my Deviant Art website, The-Ventriloquist.

summary: My name is Chaos, I'm 17, and I never learned how to socialize. New to the hp rp community and I really love my cat (her name is...
body: My name is Chaos, I’m 17, and I never learned how to socialize. New to the hp rp community and I really love my cat (her name is Lunar (or baby Loons)) and she cries a lot if she doesn’t get attention. I’m nervous to be doing this but also really excited. 💞 The community has always been really warm and welcoming with people such as TT and Jess and Jen leading the way in a positive and pure way. I’m glad to be a part of it now.

title: hello to the coming of 20BiTeen
body:
for its glorious arrival, i kinda wanted to make a survey to see who are top 19 characters from harry potter that are viewed/headcanoned as bisexual. i’ve tried my best to list as many characters as i can but i am but one person. also my laptop is dying. the poll ends on December 31 11:00 pm UTC time

- - - - - - - - - >Vote for The 19 Bis of 2019 < - - - - - - - - -

please vote and reblog it would really mean a lot!

tags: harry potter and the cursed child
sorry im terrible when its about tenses
body:
Scorbus first kiss

They’re 18 by now and in trouble again. Delphi fleed out of Azkaban and is behind them. It’s deep in the night. Albums and Scorpius are in a shabby hotel room somewhere in the west of London. Scorpius is taking care of Albus’ hand in which is a big and deep wound. As he finished he hugs his best friend. Due to there just was a one bed room they’ve to share a bed. Someone in the hotel is listening to the soundtrack of the greatest showman, a million dreams is playing. Suddenly Scorpius starts to cry quitely. As soon as Albus realises it he’s asking what’s wrong. “Nothing…” Scorpius says. “You don’t cry for no reason.” “It’s just… I’m so scared… something could happen, to me, my dad… or you. You mean so much to me, I don’t want to loose you. Do you remember the Time in which we weren’t allowed to talk to each other? It’s been so horrible…” Albus Hugs his friend. “Don’t worry, it won’t.” It’s quite for a moment. They’re still hugging. Out of an impulse Albus whispers “I love you Scorpius.” “I love you too Albus.” Again, it’s quite. They’re both realising what they just said. “O my god, yes I do, I do love you. From the moment we met, I had a huge crush on you but I never was brave enough to tell you, you always seemed to rather like girls.” “Shut up stupid.” Albus said smiling and leaning forward. They kiss, it’s a long and beautiful kiss. “You were the one who pretended to have a crush on my cousin.” Now they both are smiling.
